item.description:
The food and beer there are great. Good atmosphere. If you can't find free parking, there is a pay lot that is close. A lot of other places are within safe walking distance if people decide to explore (on Pratt St and even Allyn St). Saturday nights seem to be a good bet.


Eat dinner at 6, comedians at 7pm admission is $15.

**Then maybe a club afterwards if anyone feels like dancing :-)**



http://citysteambrewe...



City Steam Brewery Cafe
citysteambrewerycafe.com/
942 Main Street, Hartford
(860) 525-1600
item.how_to_find_us: Text or call John at 860-919-9782. If not then look for the only tall red head guy in the place :)
item.name: City Steam in Hartford
